title: endhuNDi veDalithivO
sahitya:
enduNDi veDalitivO EvUrO nE teliya ipuDaina delupavayyA



anupallavi



andacandamu vErE naData lella triguNAtItamai unnadEgAni shrI

rAma n v-



caraNam



cittukaNTE naparAdha cayamula dagilincE shiva-lOkamu gAdu vaTu

rUpuDai balini

    vancinci anacuvAni vaikuNThamu gAdu viTa vacanamulAdi shiramu

drumpa baDDa

    vidhilOkamu gAdu diTavu dharmamu satyamu mrdubhASalu galugu

divyarUpa tyAgarAjavinuta nIv-
